resources.string: This is Beautiful Upozila in Bangladesh

Shaat Gombuj Mosque is located at Bagerhat-Khulna Road, Bagerhat-9300. Shaat Gombuj more commonly known as Shait Gambuj Mosque or Saith Gunbad Masjid),a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is a mosque in Bangladesh,the largest in that country from the Sultanate period. It has been described as "the most impressive Muslim monuments in the whole of the Indian subcontinent.
